FuncDef: This command monitors statistics for a subscriber.
CLIs: subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ base ] [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] egress-policer-id <egress-policer-id> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] egress-queue-id <egress-queue-id> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] ingress-policer-id <ingress-policer-id> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

subscriber <sub-ident-string> sap <sap-id> sla-profile <sla-profile-name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] ingress-queue-id <ingress-queue-id> [ spi-sharing-type <spi-sharing-type> ] [ spi-sharing-id <spi-sharing-id> ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an existing subscriber identification profile to monitor.
Specifies the physical port identifier portion of the SAP definition.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Specifies that raw statistics are displayed, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics. ParamDefault: Default- mode delta
Specifies that the rate-per-second for each statistic is displayed instead of the delta.
Monitors statistics for this egress policer. Values-1 to 63.
Monitors statistics for this egress queue. Values-1 to 8.
Monitors statistics for this ingress policer. Values-1 to 63.
Monitors statistics for this ingress queue. Values-1 to 32.
Monitors statistics for sessions with specified SPI sharing type. Values-per-group, per-session-ipoe, per-session-ppp.
Monitors statistics for sessions with specified SPI sharing type and sharing identifier. The SPI sharing identifier is:. Values-0 to 4294967295.
